feature.label: Stats
feature.description:
This plug-in contains additional statistical operators.
It uses the 2 additional library: colt.jar and concurrent.jar.
feature.license:
Plug-in: GPL v3 licence (GAMA licence)
Aditional library: - colt.jar: LGPL and CERN - concurrent.jar: public domain and some classes from SUN Microsystems (using sun-licence)
